start_urls.title: Start URLs
start_urls.description: YouTube URLs to start scraping from (homepage, search, channel, etc.)

max_videos.title: Max Videos
max_videos.description: Maximum number of videos to scrape (default: 30)

channel.title: YouTube Channel
channel.description: YouTube channel name (without @ symbol, e.g., 'channelname' for @channelname)

youtube_email.title: YouTube Email
youtube_email.description: YouTube account email for login (optional, can also use YOUTUBE_EMAIL environment variable)

youtube_password.title: YouTube Password
youtube_password.description: YouTube account password for login (optional, can also use YOUTUBE_PASSWORD environment variable)
